title: Portfolio Website
description: The very site you are on. A modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring a clean design and an admin panel for project management.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce application featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and a checkout process. Designed for scalability and a seamless user experience.

title: Mobile Banking App
description: A secure and intuitive mobile banking application that allows users to manage their finances on the go, with features like transfers, bill payments, and transaction history.
